description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT Jan 11 '26 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Jan 12 '26 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT Jan 11 '26 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Jan 12 '26 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: XRP Up or Down on January 12?

question: XRP Up or Down on January 12?
